overview_of_class: An introduction to Dante's masterwork on human error, punishment and redemption through a careful reading of the Inferno.
name: Dante's Divine Comedy
title: WCAS ITALIAN 275-0-20 Dante's Divine Comedy

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: An introduction to Dante's masterwork on human error, punishment and redemption through a careful reading of the Inferno.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Dante Alighieri, Inferno, Durling and Martinez edition (Oxford UP)
2. Secondary material, almost all of which will be available online

subject: ITALIAN
